file_content.text: Can't be too careful in this neighborhood. The others are here, safe and sound.
That's a relief. I hope one of them brought the Gravestone.
All we need now is our ship.
Everyone's on foot. Whatever put us here didn't want us too mobile.
The last time I saw Vette, Vaylin was about to kill her.
How is Vette?
It shook her up, but Vette's tough. Already focused on getting us home.
Vaylin's forces may know where to find their Empress. Bring me people to interrogate.
We need more information.
We'll do what we can. You know what it's like out there.
I'm scanning for our ship, but so far nothing. The Gravestone could be anywhere.
Keep looking. SCORPIO said our vessel was built on Iokath.
It came from this world.
You saw how huge this planet is from orbit. My scans can only extend so far.
If this is our base of operations, we need to know it's absolutely safe. What have you learned?
Tell me about this place.
It feels like some kind of monument. To what, I don't know--but we're the only ones here.
We won't need the Gravestone. We can kill Vaylin without it.
All I want is Vaylin's head.
I'd rather hit her with the Omnicannon. More satisfying. Safer, too.
What's the traitor doing here?
He picked up my holo-signal to the others and I let him in, against my better judgment. Told him if he moves, he's dead.
And I told you, I came to help. Come on, Commander. I want off this rock as much as you.
The past is done. We need to focus on the present. I'll take all the help I can get.
We're all in this together.
You heard the Commander. Start by helping secure this entrance.
You've "helped" enough, Koth. You had your chance to be a hero.
I don't want your help.
The only reason you're here is so you won't cause more trouble out there. Don't push it.
We need to secure this entrance.
I can help with that.
Vette's in the main room, poking at one of those monuments. She's onto something that could help.
Sorry you were on your own for so long. I got here as fast as I could.
It's good to see you, my love.
People keep trying to break us up. They never learn.
I ran a medical scan when she arrived. She's fine. Excited to see you.
And I told you, I came to help. Come on, Commander. I want off this hunk of metal as much as you.
